title: Can't load into games every second patch, any ideas why?
body:
Hey guys, just a bit of a question. 

Every even patch since 5.14 (and including 5.14) has prevented me from successfully loading into games. I can open the client fine and get through champ select but each time I begin loading into the game I met with a black screen that eventually pops up with the message saying that I have failed to connect to the server. Again this has only happened on 5.14, 5.16, 5.18 and now 5.20. All other patches have worked without a problem. If anyone can provide any insight to the cause of this and moreso how I can fix it that would be greatly appreciated.

tl;dr can't load into games on even patches.

Thanks, Grkd131

replies.body: same thing is happening to me, but im getting a different error this time and it has seemed to effect my whole lobby. I get a directX compatiblity error and the game can't start. been an hour since we got out of champ select when im typing this and not even a second has been played by both of the teams.
Did you have any success fixing this?
